attributes.action: Abolish council tax in favour of a food tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To abolish council tax and to replace it with a tax on food by 1p on every item including sweets and drinks. Everybody in the UK will be contributing to this including those who don't pay council tax including the unemployed, immigrants, tourists & children.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
